job.title: Software Sr Engineer - Big data
job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongImportant Note During the application process ensure your contact information email and phone number is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation The invitation can be sent by both email and text message In order to receive text message invitations your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as Personal Cell or Cellular in the contact information of your applicationbrbrAt Wells Fargo we are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do We are seeking candidates who embrace diversity equity and inclusion in a workplace where everyone feels valued and inspiredbrbrHelp us build a better Wells Fargo It all begins with outstanding talent It all begins with youbrbrTechnology sets IT strategy enhances the design development and operations of our systems optimizes the Wells Fargo infrastructure provides information security and enables Wells Fargo global customers to have 24 hours a day 7 days a week banking access through inbranch online ATMs and other channelsbrbrOur mission is to deliver stable secure scalable and innovative services at speeds that delight and satisfy our customers and unleash the skills potential of our employeesbrbrCorporate Risk technology has embarked on an ambitious Risk Transformation program and as part of that were looking for a Software Sr Engineer Calculation Services who will partner with the key business risk and Enterprise Information Technology EIT leaders to drive all activities including strategy planning and implementation of key deliverables for the Calculation Services group which focuses on Model development testing and deployment areas Enterprise Risk CIO organization provides technology to several lines of business and is a 700 person global organization This team works closely with the Corporate Model Risk and Risk CoEs to ensure that the corporation meets its regulatory and compliance timelines This is a unique opportunity to make a huge impact to the Risk and Finance organization as various transformational projects are implementedbrbrSeeking a Seasoned candidate with experience in design development of enterprise systems and handling high volumes of data Domain knowledge in Financial risk and some handson keyboard experience Candidate will be part of the team which supports technology needs of Model Integration and Implementation for model life cycle activities like model development testing integration production runs and model performance monitoring Technologies used are a suite of stateoftheart Quant tools which include tools like Python R Spark Scala H2O etcbrbrstronguResponsibilities IncludebrustrongulliDrives and participates in design development and implementation of large and complex application owning your solution through implementationliliWorks closely with developers and testers to ensure requirements and functional designs are translated accurately into working technical designs and that test plans and scripts meet customer needsliliWorks with developers and business partners to understand application defects performance problems and data anomaliesliliCreates a roadmap for implementation of various data preparation activities for model team and troubleshoots data questionsliliDrives requirements and design discussions in both Agile and Waterfall methodologies RWFbrliulstronguRequired technology solution designlili3 years of experience in one or a combination of the following information security compliance operational risk management includes audit legal credit risk market risk or the management of a process or business with accountability for compliance or operational riskbrliulstronguDesired QualificationsbrustrongulliAn industrystandard technology certificationliliStrong verbal written and interpersonal communication skillsliliA BSBA degree or higher in science or technologyliliAgile experienceliliAbility to communicate effectively with a quantitative development team about models and integration strategiesliliAbility to gather analyze and interpret large datasetsliliAdvanced Microsoft Office Word Excel and Outlook skillsliliKnowledge and understanding of risk management or quantitative modelingliliStrong analytical skills with high attention to detail and accuracylili5 years of data modeling experienceliliAdvanced problem solving and technical troubleshooting capabilitiesliliExperience articulating a complex problem design or build strategylili5 years of experience delivering ETL data warehouse and data analytics capabilities on bigdata architecture such as Hadooplili1 years of ETL data warehouse and data analytics delivery experience on internal or external cloud platformslili2 years of risk and finance regulatory reporting
